config.completionLanguages: Languages in which the completion feature is enabled. We support the following three languages. "mtml", "html" and "css"
config.referenceManualLanguages: Languages in which the reference manual feature is enabled. We support the following three languages. "mtml", "html" and "css"
config.foldingLanguages: Languages in which the folding feature is enabled. We support the following three languages. "mtml" and "css"
